| Aspect | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Localization Strategy | Volkswagen's localization strategy is to adapt the content to meet the needs of the local market while maintaining the brand identity. They work to ensure that the translations are not only accurate but also culturally appropriate. |
| Teams | Volkswagen has a dedicated team of localization professionals who manage the translation and localization process. |
| TMS | Volkswagen uses a Translation Management System (TMS) to manage the localization process. |
| MT | Volkswagen uses Machine Translation (MT) to increase the efficiency of the localization process. |
| TM | Volkswagen uses Translation Memory (TM) to maintain consistency across translations and to save time and costs. |
| API | Volkswagen uses Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) to integrate their TMS with their Content Management System (CMS) and other tools, enabling a seamless localization workflow. |
| CMS Integration | Volkswagen's TMS is integrated with their CMS, allowing for a more efficient localization process. |
| Security | Volkswagen takes data security and confidentiality seriously and has implemented various measures to protect their data and the data of their customers. |
| Standards and Guidelines | Volkswagen has established standards and guidelines for their localization process to ensure quality and consistency across all translations. |
| I18N tools | Volkswagen uses various internationalization (I18N) tools to ensure that their content can be easily translated and localized. |
| Methods and Models | Volkswagen uses various methods and models for their localization process to ensure efficiency and quality. |
| Workflows | Volkswagen has established workflows for their localization process to ensure that the process is efficient and that all stakeholders are informed of the progress of the localization. |
| TMS Customization | Volkswagen has customized their TMS to meet their specific needs and requirements. |
| Technics | Volkswagen uses various techniques to ensure the quality of their translations, such as human reviews and Quality Assurance (QA) processes. |
| Reporting and Analytics | Volkswagen uses reporting and analytics to measure the efficiency and effectiveness of their localization process and to identify areas for improvement. |
| Vendors | Volkswagen works with various translation vendors to ensure that they have access to the necessary resources to support their localization process. |
| Reviews/LQA | Volkswagen conducts linguistic reviews and Language Quality Assurance (LQA) to ensure that the translations are accurate and meet the standards and guidelines. |
